data.title: David Mazur on LinkedIn: I am currently looking for an on
data.meta_description: I am currently looking for an on-air position or a programming position at your station. https://mazurradio.com
data.text:
We have a great opportunity to join TEAM WIFC in Central Wisconsin! See below, our current co-host Nikki Montgomery has accepted a job outside of radio and will be leaving us on June 2nd. #team #opportunity #job #work #talent #communications 95.5 WIFC Morning Show Co-Host Wausau, Serving Central Wisconsin YOU: Fun. Energetic. Contemporary. Friendly. Highly interactive on the air, on the street and on social media. Able to develop excellent chemistry with your veteran co-host Dave Kallaway in morning drive. US: Top-rated 95.5 WIFC and Duke Wright‚Äôs Midwest Communications; a highly respected independently held company. Boasting a 100kw signal and decades of ratings dominance, WIFC is deeply connected with the region in which we live! WHERE: Wausau, WI, your four-seasons play zone, offering boundless outdoor recreation, shopping, arts and culture, restaurants, amazing parks and a vibrant nightlife. You‚Äôll work in an excellent facility; enjoy a competitive salary and a full benefits package. A good driving record and a valid driver‚Äôs license are required. You will be joining a solid team of professional talents. This is a tremendous and exceptional opportunity for a hungry, hardworking, passionate talent. Send your audio, examples of your social media skills (videos, screen shots, etc.), resume & anything that best displays your talent. Send to: Operations Manager, Jon Reilly at jon.reilly@mwcradio.com or mail to Jon‚Äôs attention at 557 Scott Street, Wausau, WI 54403. WIFC-FM and Midwest Communications is an Equal Opportunity Employer by choice.

I am so excited to announce that I am now the Morning Show Co-Host on Star 96.7 with Eddie Volkman in addition to afternoons on 102.3 XLC üéôI am so grateful for this amazing opportunity! It is truly an honor to be working alongside Chicago radio legend, Eddie, previously from ‚ÄúEddie and Jobo‚Äù on B96! I‚Äôll be starting Monday morning! I can‚Äôt wait!! Thank you to my family, friends, coworkers, and radio fam for your endless support! üíôüéô You can hear Eddie and Hannah every Monday-Friday morning (5am-10am) on Star 96.7! Then take me with on your way home (3-7PM) on 102.3 XLC! üòä
